page.title: 04SOUTH GREENHOE MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: South Greenhoe Middle School is a Church of England Voluntary Controlled Middle School.South Greenhoe has parts of the building named after famous people like 1st and 3rd years are named Fleming House,2nd and 3rd years are named Hilary House and the 4th year's classes are named after Vaughan Williams. School starts in the morning at 8.40am to 11.50 am and afternoon starts at 1.20 pm to 3.20 pm. The builing was built between 1971 and 1975 and was officially opened on the 6th of April 1976. The school has about 380 pupils. South Greenhoe is a primary school, catering for boys and girls aged between 8 and 12 years.
